events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting extensive experience with cloud architecture and backend development.
The application from John Doe has been categorised under Engineering, focusing on backend development and cloud computing expertise.
Recruiter assigned to John Doeâ€™s file to facilitate further communications and coordinate next steps in the recruitment process.
Completed initial phone screening with John Doe, who demonstrated strong knowledge of software development lifecycle and cloud architecture principles.
Received prompt and enthusiastic response from John Doe confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Technical interview for John Doe has been scheduled for May 8th at 10:00 AM with the senior development team to evaluate coding skills and system design.
